Description: If a creature attempts to use a move that boosts its stats, you may use your reaction to negate the increase and convert it into healing energy, recovering regain hit points. This includes critical hit bonuses, AC increases, speed, attack and damage boosts, etc.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
